sqlquery.name: SQL_USLA_Test.query.evtmp
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ etp.pid ,etp.eventid ,etp.ruleids ,etp.duetime ,etp.defaultuser ,etp.defaultgroup ,etp.defaultrole ,etp.eventparamxml /*COUNT*/ from bs_t_usla_eventtemp etp where etp.status = 1 $customwhere$

sqlquery.name: SQL_USLA_Test.query.pre
sqlquery.select: select pid, loginname, fullname, mobile, email from bs_t_sm_user where 1=1 and depid = #depid#

sqlquery.name: SQL_USLA_Test.query.after
sqlquery.select: select pid, loginname, fullname, mobile, email from bs_t_sm_user where 1=1 and depid = #depidcomp#

sqlquery.name: SQL_USLA_Test.query.getUser
sqlquery.select: select pid, loginname, fullname, mobile, email from bs_t_sm_user where loginname in ('xufaqiu','sunhailong')

sqlquery.name: SQL_USLA_Test.query.getParam
sqlquery.select: select '故障' basename, '孙海龙' operateuser from dual
